meanings.definition: A Palestinian uprising against Israeli occupation.
meanings.sent1: The intifadehs in the region were a powerful display of resistance.
meanings.sent2: The intifadehs caused a lot of unrest in the area.
meanings.sent3: During the intifadehs, even the pigeons seemed to be protesting!
meanings.sent4: The intifadehs were a storm of defiance against the occupation.
meanings.sent5: The intifadehs painted a vivid picture of people standing up for their rights.

meanings.definition: A series of violent protests or demonstrations.
meanings.sent1: The intifadehs led to clashes between the protesters and authorities.
meanings.sent2: The intifadehs resulted in damage to public property.
meanings.sent3: The intifadehs turned the streets into a chaotic dance of dissent.
meanings.sent4: The intifadehs were a thunderous roar of public outcry.
meanings.sent5: The intifadehs left a lasting mark on the history of protests.
